login.title: login
login.content1: This is a login page for the e-Government Standard Framework web-site.
login.content2: All services are available without restriction by logging in.
login.content3: The password can be used by mixing 8-12 characters of English case/case letters, numbers, and special characters.
login.content4: If the password for an easy password or a frequently used site is the same, it is easy to steal, so it is recommended to change it periodically.
